text: Viewers of the 2017 American Music Awards witnessed history. Introduced by The Chainsmokers, BTS made their U. S. television debut at the 2017 American Music Awards on Sunday, November 19th. BTS is taking the U. S over a landslide by being the first Korean Pop Boy Band to perform on a major American awards show. BTS delivered their latest hit “ DNA ” with flashy choreography and enormous support from their A. R. M. Y. ( a name given to their international fanbase ) who accompanied them with chants throughout their performance. Tweets during and after their epic performance took over social media with the hashtag # BTSxAMAs.
